entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
